name: ui (creativetimofficial)
description: [项目级] Open-source components, blocks, and AI agents designed to speed up your workflow. Import them seamlessly into your favorite tools through Registry and MCPs.。来源: https://github.com/creativetimofficial/ui

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Creative Tim UI provides pre-built, customizable React components and blocks designed for building beautiful, production-ready web applications. 
The CLI makes it easy to add these components to your Next.js project.

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
You can use the Creative Tim UI CLI directly with npx, or install it globally:
```bash

name: ui/apps 模块
description: [模块级] ui 项目的 apps 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/creativetimofficial/ui

genes.title: apps 模块说明
genes.content:
模块路径: apps/
类型: source
文件数: 189

包含文件:
- apps/www
- apps/www/.env.example
- apps/www/.gitignore
- apps/www/.prettierignore
- apps/www/app
- apps/www/app/(app)
- apps/www/app/(app)/(root)
- apps/www/app/(app)/(root)/page.tsx
- apps/www/app/(app)/blocks
- apps/www/app/(app)/blocks/[...categories]

genes.title: apps 文件结构
genes.content:
apps/www
apps/www/.env.example
apps/www/.gitignore
apps/www/.prettierignore
apps/www/app
apps/www/app/(app)
apps/www/app/(app)/(root)
apps/www/app/(app)/(root)/page.tsx
apps/www/app/(app)/blocks
apps/www/app/(app)/blocks/[...categories]
apps/www/app/(app)/blocks/[...categories]/page.tsx
apps/www/app/(app)/blocks/layout.tsx
apps/www/app/(app)/blocks/page.tsx
apps/www/app/(app)/docs
apps/www/app/(app)/docs/[[...slug]]
